reviewText: I take full responsibility for purchasing an item that was not able to be viewed in the United States.  As I look back at the product on the Amazon site, it is plainly written in RED that the item is not viewable in the USA, it is a Region 2 only product.  I was so excited to see Peppa Pig available that I overlooked the warning that was in plain site.  I have been in contact with the company who sent it and they have been so very cooperative in getting the 2 DVD's returned and they have been more than helpful and extremely kind.  Just make sure when ordering that you are in Region 2 for viewing. We still love Peppa Pig, in fact it is one of our very favorites!!! And if Chalky's offers any products for the USA I would have no hesitation in ordering from them.  They are a great company and you can order from them with confidence!!
summary: Really Great Customer Service from the United Kingdom
Title: N/A

reviewText: Is there anything better than the sound of your child¡s laughter?  I put this on for my son and had to leave the room and all I could hear was him laughing his head off!  Now my son does not laugh out loud often.  He¡s like his mom where something has to be really funny to get a laugh!My kids have always loved this show and it¡s one that they always stop what they¡re doing and sit down to watch in its entirety.  I was so excited there¡s a DVD they can now watch whenever they want!  As soon as my daughter got up from her nap my son ran to tell her about the DVD and we all watched it together.  Paige loved it as much as Reed.  She just sits there with a smile on her face the whole time she¡s watching.  I think it¡s all the snorting from the pigs she enjoys so much!Typically my kids do not enjoy anything with a foreign accent.  I think it is just so out of context with them that they don¡t understand it.  However, Peppa Pig and her families British accents actually are part of the intrigue for them I believe!  The graphics are so cute!  It reminds me of storybooks from my childhood.  It¡s simple but colorful and classic.I LOVE that the episodes are so short!  They are only five minutes each so it¡s a great stopping point if we need to do something but they can keep watching more if they want.  I especially love when they get one more show before bed and they pick these!    This DVD is ten episodes of pure entertainment!

reviewText: Works great for short trips to the store or grandma's house.  Bought for grandsons both 4 years old and holds interest.  For longer trips, the stories get repeated before getting to destination -- bores one grandson and delights the other because he also snorts when he laughs.
